SEARCH
Module sc2002OOP
Package sc2002OOP.obj.careercenterstaff

Class CareerCenterStaff

java.lang.Object
sc2002OOP.obj.User
sc2002OOP.obj.careercenterstaff.CareerCenterStaff
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ICareerCenterStaff
public class CareerCenterStaff extends User implements ICareerCenterStaff, Serializable

Career Center Staff (User Role)

This class represents a user with the Career Center Staff role in the IPMS. It inherits core functionalities from the User base class and implements the ICareerCenterStaff interface to provide administrative and approval functionalities.

Staff members are primarily responsible for approving and rejecting user registrations (Company Representatives), internship opportunities, and student withdrawal requests.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Kee Kai Wen, Kelvin Tay Wei Jie, Koay Jun Zhi, Lim Jia Wei Jerald, Teo Kai Jie

    • CareerCenterStaff

      public CareerCenterStaff(String userID, String name, String role, String department, String email, String password)
      Constructs a new CareerCenterStaff object, initializing user details and staff-specific attributes. * @param userID The unique identification number for the staff member (aka staffID).
      Parameters:
      name - The full name of the staff member.
      role - The specific role of the staff member.
      department - The department the staff member belongs to.
      email - The email address of the staff member.
      password - The hashed password of the staff member.

  • Method Details

    • approveRejectCompRep

      public void approveRejectCompRep(Scanner sc)
      Allows the staff member to view and either approve or reject pending registration requests from CompanyRepresentative users. The decision updates the representative's status in the system.
      Specified by:
      approveRejectCompRep in interface ICareerCenterStaff
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • approveRejectWithdrawalRequest

      public void approveRejectWithdrawalRequest(Scanner sc)
      Allows the staff member to view and either approve or reject pending WithdrawalRequest submissions from students.

      Approving a request successfully removes the corresponding internship application and updates the filled places count for the internship opportunity.

      Specified by:
      approveRejectWithdrawalRequest in interface ICareerCenterStaff
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • approveRejectInternshipOpp

      public void approveRejectInternshipOpp(Scanner sc)
      Allows the staff member to view and either approve or reject pending InternshipOpportunity submissions from Company Representatives.

      Approval makes the internship visible and available for student applications.

      Specified by:
      approveRejectInternshipOpp in interface ICareerCenterStaff
      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • exportApplicationsReport

      public void exportApplicationsReport(Scanner sc)
      Generates and exports a comprehensive report of internship applications based on specified filter criteria (Internship ID, Title, Company ID, Status, etc.).

      The report is saved as a CSV file to a predefined path (Constants.EXPORT_REPORTS_PATH).

      Parameters:
      sc - The Scanner object used for user input.

    • viewInternshipOpps

      public void viewInternshipOpps(Scanner sc)
      Allows the staff member to view and filter all internship opportunities in the system, regardless of visibility status (for administrative oversight). Filter settings are saved for continuity.
      Specified by:
      viewInternshipOpps in class User
      Parameters:
